The MobDevBot API reference¶

The “data_manipulator” module¶

src.data_manager.data_manipulator.compare_data(text, data_folder='../../data/')¶

Compare two datasets, return result on changes in the second dataset

Function receives a string which contains two dates separated by space. If there are two files in data folder with same exact names, function will return them, otherwise it will return an error message.

Parameters:
  • text (string) – string with two file names separated by space
  • data_folder (string) – folder path for archived data
Returns:

a list with three datasets, which are also saved for bot to use, or returns error
src.data_manager.data_manipulator.show_archive(data_folder='../../data/')¶

Return a list of scraped data for the last 31 days
